description:
Hazuki`s behavior is growing increasingly odd. While Elfriede wonders if she has turned to her alter-ego to escape her guilt, Kouhei realizes how much he misses the other side of Hazuki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to Go for a Walk with You, Big Brother
Onii-sama to Issho ni...... Osanpo Shitai Desu
おにいさまといっしょに...... お散歩したいです
